required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on May 09, 2023
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

clinical_study.brief_title: Robotic Total Knee Arthroplasty Anesthesia Management
clinical_study.official_title: Robotic Total Knee Arthroplasty Anesthesia Management: Retrospective Study

lead_sponsor.agency: Saglik Bilimleri Universitesi Gulhane Tip Fakultesi

clinical_study.source: Saglik Bilimleri Universitesi Gulhane Tip Fakultesi

brief_summary.textblock:
Robotic arthroplasty is increasing in acceptance on a global scale as a result of advancements in orthopedic surgery technology.
The investigators aimed to share our anesthesia management experience as well as compare robotic unilateral total knee arthroplasty with conventional surgical technique in this retrospective study.

detailed_description.textblock:
This study was approved by the ethics committee of a tertiary academic hospital.
The following criteria were used to assess inclusion: ASA physical status I-III patients aged 40-85 years, elective unilateral total knee arthroplasty (TKAs) performed by a single senior orthopedic surgeon and orthopedic team under combined spinal epidural anesthesia (CSEA) between January 2021 and January 2023. Exclusion criteria included urgent surgery, bilateral surgery, previous surgery, missing data, and being lost to follow-up during the perioperative period. Data was collected from the hospital's electronic database records, patient files, and anesthesia charts.

primary_outcome.time_frame: Only in surgery time, an average of 3 hours

secondary_outcome.time_frame: After the end of surgery, in the first 1-month follow-up
Time from discharge from PACU to discharge from hospital, an average of 96 hours
secondary_outcome.description: Time from the beginning of the operation to the discharge of hospital

arm_group.description: the robot assisted total knee arthroplasty
the conventional jig-based total knee arthroplasty

intervention.intervention_name: the robot assisted total knee arthroplasty
intervention.description: the robot assisted total knee arthroplasty

intervention.intervention_name: the conventional jig-based total knee arthroplasty
intervention.description: the conventional jig-based total knee arthroplasty

study_pop.textblock: Patients with American Society of Anesthesiologists (ASA) physical status I-III and elective unilateral TKAs between the ages of 40 and 85 will be analyzed.

criteria.textblock:
Inclusion Criteria:
- American Society of Anesthesiologists (ASA) physical status I-III
- Between 40-85 years
- Elective unilateral TKAs which were performed by a single senior orthopedic surgeon
- Between January 2021 and January 2023 under CSEA.
Exclusion Criteria:
- Urgent surgery
- Bilateral surgery
- Previous surgery
- Missing data and lost to follow-up in the perioperative period

responsible_party.investigator_affiliation: Saglik Bilimleri Universitesi Gulhane Tip Fakultesi
